item.title: BRIDGFORD FOODS CORP 10-K
item.description: BRIDGFORD FOODS CORP, which is in the Sausage, Other Prepared Meat Products [2013] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 26, 2023 had 22036 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 272 instances 2022 - 236 instances fiscal - 213 instances year - 186 instances 2021 - 186 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
